sentences.english: ObjectiveTo compare the effect of the normal frequency jet ventilation with the high frequency jet ventilation in suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 比較常頻通氣與高頻通氣在支撐喉鏡手術前應用效果。

sentences.english: I have a friend who recently underwent a laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 有位朋友最近做了喉鏡檢查。

sentences.english: To investigate the value of vocal fold abduction for bilateral vocal cord paralysis through the suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討支撐喉鏡下聲帶外展術對聲帶麻痹的療效。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the operating method of broad-based via fibre laryngoscope vocal polyp.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纖維喉鏡下廣基聲帶息肉的手術方式。

sentences.english: The Laryngeal microsurgery under laryngoscope is an advanced technique.
sentences.chinese: 支撐喉鏡下很顯微手術是現代醫學的先進技術。

sentences.english: After intravenous anesthesia induction, orotracheal intubation was performed using the direct laryngoscope.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈麻醉誘導後採用直接喉鏡實施經口氣管插管。

sentences.english: CTVL is a good complementary method of laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: CTVL是纖維喉鏡的很好補充手段。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyze the complications of the CO2 laser-assisted laryngeal microsurgery for laryngeal tumors.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析支撐喉鏡下CO2激光喉腫瘤手術的併發症。

sentences.english: Methods Semiconductor laser was acted with fiberoptic laryngoscope to treat 26 cses with laryngopharynx hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 方法纖維喉鏡下半導體激光治療咽喉部血管瘤26例。

sentences.english: The nurse handed him the laryngoscope with which to visualize the vocal cords before inserting the breathing tube into the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 護士遞給他喉鏡，以便他在插入氣管導管前暴露聲帶。
